attributes.action: Investigate fully all cases brought by the RSPCA
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is an alarming increase in RSPCA animal cruelty allegations being brought before the Courts by this charity, Many cases lack legal credibilty and have not stood any legal tests before being given court time, why?
Most of these cases are not challenged by the CPS and affect Women who in the main care for the animals they have.
Looking at many cases , we feel that this is simply being allowed to continue to convict more women. Indeed this could be discrimination at the highest level.
We would like a judicial review on how these cases are being brought to Courts with immediate effect.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
